div.h2: VhDir Digital Certificate Type Value Set

div.p: In a certificate-based public key cryptographic system, certificates are issued to subscribers, whose name appears as the subject in the certificate. This value set defines a set of terms describing the types of subscribers who may be issued digital certificates.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-digitalcertificate
CodeDisplay
TLS/SSLTLS/SSLA certificate for a device such as a server or router, used to authenticate the device and establish secure communications between the device and a client.
deviceDeviceA certificate used to verify the identity of a device.
grpGroupA certificate for a collection of individual subscribers acting in a shared capacity, such as an organization.
indIndividualA certificate for a single person.
roleRole basedA certificate for a specific role on behalf of which a subscriber is authorized to act, such as a Chief Information Officer.
